General.Name: IOU Financial Inc
General.Description: IOU Financial Inc. operates as a wholesale marketplace lender in the United States. The company originates and sells commercial loans receivable; and services loans that are sold to institutional purchasers on a non-recourse basis. It is involved in the commercial lending brokerage business. The company serves medical and dental practices, grocery and retail stores, restaurant and hotel franchisees, and e-commerce companies. IOU Financial Inc. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1 Place Ville-Marie, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3B 2B6
